about_the_game:
You are a survivor of a great catastrophe. that causes the human race to extinct The world has entered an era of collapse. The weather is full of pollution. Living things died. The only way to survive in this harsh environment is to "adapt". and evolve to survive in this harsh environment We call this process. "metamorphosis"

cruel world

The world is full of twisted creatures. How can you yourself survive in this world? What you should do is find food and water to survive. and escape from the dangers of mutant animals.
Or will you mutate and become like them?

Fighting with available weapons

Pick up your weapon. You have 2 hands. You can choose to equip the weapon according to your proficiency as you can find it, left hand or right hand, it's up to you. Or punch it with your bare fist. That's yours.

build a shelter

You need a place to sleep. Create your accommodation But please be careful. You may be invaded. It is recommended to build it strong enough to withstand attacks, at least giving it some safe space to relax.

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200／Intel Core i3-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB

short_description: Toxic Place, an exciting story in the form of a soul like game, combined with a sandbox for you to experience adventure. In a world full of pollution and monsters that have been affected have mutated into terrifying creatures. Will you be able to survive this cruel world?
